Helix.text:
WHAT: Vision-Language-Action (VLA) model 
CATEGORY: Robotics 
FEATURES: implicit stereo vision, multi-scale visual representation, learned visual proprioception, sport mode 
CAPABILITIES: logistics package manipulation and triaging, object handling 
STAGE: active 
LINKS: https://figure.ai/news/helix-logistics 
NOTE: internally designed by Figure

company.text:
NAME: Figure 
POSITIONING: Bringing humanoid robots into the workforce 
INDUSTRIES: Robotics, Logistics
